Designation: Electrical Site Engineer.
 (MEP DEPARTMENT)
 
Job Description
 
 :

Work accordance with CPWD (Central Public Work Department) with BOQ (Bill Of 
Quantities.

Handling all the electrical works considering the safety and quality requirements, 
Work accordance with Auto Cad Drawing, Work accordance with electrical calculation 
like (LUX) (VOLTAGE) (CURRENT) (POWER) etc.,Preparation of daily progress 
report (DPR). Supervision of work to ensure progress as per schedule & execution as 
per approved drawing and specification., Sound Knowledge about Installation of 
Circuit breakers , relays, Conduit and duct banks.

Understanding of Single line diagram (SLD Managing & Execution of Electrical Project,
Co-ordinating with clients, consultant, contractors & vendors, installation of 
transformer and D.G. set. Erection of H.T. and main L.T. panels including cabling with
termination. Conducting lighting with wiring. Erection of cable trays support for laying
of L.T. cables. And understanding Fire Fighting and HVAC like (M.E.P) 
certification of measurement book from concern authorities. Preparing overall project 
scheduled and billing schedule. Preparing schedule of recourses, 
 
Summary of Skills: 
 
  monitoring all site activities on real time basis to ensure completion of project 
with in time and cost parameters for effective resources deployment to maximize the
out put.
  Ensuring timely availability of man power and equipment/material for 
completion of project
  liaising with clients, consultant, contractors and external agencies for 
determining technical specification, approval and obtaining statutory clearances.
  Reconciliation of materials received at site/stores. Implementing quality and 
safety standards at site.
 
Computer skills:
  MS Word, Power Point, MS Excel. 
  Language HTML, Basic of C.
  Matlab Simulation.
  AUTO-CAD from HR INTERNATIONAL GROUP.
Interpersonal:
  A Highly motivated team player with the ability to quickly & integrate new 
idea. 
  Communicating & performing in a dynamic & cross-functional environment.
  Leading, supervising and taking ownership of projects and their deliverables.
  Meeting deadlines & working under pressure.
Achievement: 
  3rd rank in 5th & 6th semester in B.TECH
  1st rank in 7th & 8th semester in B.TECH
